tool_description: A JSON API providing high-performance, durable counters that can be securely accessed from anywhere!
name: Instacount
title: Instacount

api_list.name: Health Check
api_list.description: Check the health of the Instacount API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instacount.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instacount.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instacount.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instacount.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve Counter
api_list.description: Get a counter by its name.

required_parameters.name: counter_name
required_parameters.description: The name of the counter to retrieve.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instacount.p.rapidapi.com/sharded_counters/counter-abc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instacount.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instacount.p.rapidapi.com/sharded_counters/{counter_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instacount.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Counter Operation
api_list.description: A discrete increment or decrement operation that was performed against a shard of a counter.

required_parameters.name: counter_name
required_parameters.description: The counter name for the operation to be retrieved.

required_parameters.name: operation_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of the operation to be retrieved.

required_parameters.name: shard_number
required_parameters.description: The shard number for the operation was applied against.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instacount.p.rapidapi.com/sharded_counters/counter-abc/shards/1/operations/123-456-789"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instacount.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instacount.p.rapidapi.com/sharded_counters/{counter_name}/shards/{shard_number}/operations/{operation_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instacount.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
